tool_description: Text To Emotions API, a powerful text analysis tool designed to unveil the underlying emotions in any given text. This innovative API takes textual input and processes it to provide a comprehensive emotional profile with values ranging from 0 to 1, enabling a more nuanced understanding of the emotions conveyed.
name: Text To Emotions
title: Text To Emotions

api_list.name: read_root__get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-emotions2.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-emotions2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
